description.en:
The classroom seminars provide an overview of the tools and methods related to the creation of a website. Practical work is carried out.
Topics include:
1. Creating a source task and planning a website.
2. Tools and strategy for internet marketing.
3. WordPress content management system.
4. Webpage content creation.
5. Search Engine Optimization.
6. Web analytics.
description.et:
Auditoorsetes seminarides antakse ülevaade veebilehe loomisega seonduvatest vahenditest ja meetoditest. Teostatakse praktilisi töid. 
Teemad: 
1. Lähteülesande koostamine ja veebilehe planeerimine.
2. Internetiturunduse vahendid ja strateegia.
3. Sisuhaldussüsteem Wordpress.
4. Veebilehe sisuloome.
5. Otsimootorile optimeerimine.
6. Veebianalüütika.

objectives.en: The aim of this course is to give basic knowledge and skills about internet marketing strategies, creating and managing websites with Wordpress, web analytics and optimising for search engines.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on anda põhiteadmised internetiturunduse strateegia, Wordpressi baasil veebilehe loomise ja haldamise, otsimootorile optimeerimise ja veebianalüütika kohta.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) knows how to create a web page source task;
2) knows the tools of online marketing;
3) knows the possibilities of the free content management system WordPress;
4) knows the role of search engine optimization;
5) knows the possibilities of web analytics;
6) can create a web page source task and an internet marketing strategy;
learning_outcomes.et: 6) oskab luua veebilehe lähteülesande ja internetiturunduse strateegia;

learning_outcomes.en: 7) can create a simpler web page with the necessary attachments (web page content creation);
learning_outcomes.et: 7) oskab luua lihtsama veebilehe koos vajalike lisadega;

learning_outcomes.en: 9) can optimize the web page for search engine;
10) can use Google Analytics' key tools for web analytics.
learning_outcomes.et: 10) oskab kasutada veebianalüütika jaoks Google Analyticsi peamisi vahendeid.
